data_def: sw" }, xaxis: { axisLabel: "Generations", axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, yaxis: { min: 0, axisLabel: "Fitness", axisLabelOffset: -150, axisLabelFontSizePixels: 12 }, grid: { hoverable: true, clickable: true }, selection: { mode: "xy" }
data_def.title: Fitness History

datasource.description: FPG (for Forward Population Genetic simulation) simulates a population of constant size that is undergoing various evolutionary processes, including:  mutation, recombination,  natural selection, and migration. https://bio.cst.temple.edu/~hey/software/software.htm#FPG
